eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: The mysterious girl finds Meng Tieyi at the Sword Forge, and confesses her identity. She seems to have something of a grudge against Chongyue, and owing to an old friendship, Meng Tieyi decides to help the girl flee the city.

attributes.content: Let us out.
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: We've been through this.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The General has declared a high alert to ensure Yumen's safety. No one is allowed to leave the city without permission.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Turn back.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: You dare speak of Yumen's safety to me?
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: We were guarding Yumen long before you even picked up a stick, kiddo!
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: In times like these, I need you to think about the greater good.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The greater good?
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: Do you remember when a group of bandits infiltrated the city and injured innocent people in the process?
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: It happened so suddenly, and the situation was so messy that you refused to lift a finger, so we had to take things into our own hands. We chased them hundreds of li and spent three whole days in the desert.
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: We had to carry half our brothers back to the city, but we managed to drag the bandits along with us.
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: Now our brothers lie dead out there, their bodies still rotting, and you're asking us to wait?
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: Master Jing, we all know your story, and we have infinite respect for you.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: But General Zuo has decreed that while we are hunting a serious criminal, no one is to leave the city without his permission.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: His awe-inspiring authority has me quaking!
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: Tell that Zuo Xuanliao to come out here and face us!
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: Impudence!
Master Meng...
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: I heard you shouting from across the city. These men are only following orders. Why do you have to be so hard on them?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: We just, can't let them talk to us like this...
attributes.name: Angry Martial Artist

attributes.content: You're venerable elders of our city.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You've fought many battles to defend Yumen, even Messengers through Catastrophes. Our stability is thanks to your hard work.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Even though the Lord Exorcist and Grandmaster are still present, you dare to flaunt your seniority as if it matters?!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Have you no heart...?
attributes.name: Disappointed Martial Artist

attributes.content: Good men need not remind the people of their past deeds. If you need to boast about it, that just goes to show how little it truly mattered.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Go home and make no further trouble. I will ensure your fallen brothers are spoken for.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: ...Yes, Master.
attributes.name: Disappointed Martial Artist

attributes.content: The blame lies with me, I neglected their discipline.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: We would never blame you.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: About those four brothers... you have my condolences.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: I'll take care of their families. There's no need to bother the Lord Exorcist.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But since they died delivering a letter for Yumen, I'd like to ask the Lord Exorcist his opinion on the situation.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: We have to focus on the assassin for now, but when we're done, the Lord Exorcist will absolutely dispatch troops to clear out the bandits.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Right... you have to prioritize, that makes sense.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I just want a word with the Lord Exorcist. I need a reply, any kind of reply, to answer to those brothers.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Once we are done with this, you are all welcome to the Sword Forge for drinks.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Yühsia.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: How's the situation on your end? Have the families of the victims been located?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Actually, two of the four were living alone.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: As for the other two, their families happened to be away from home, so we took it upon ourselves to barge in.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: It's a bit strange that all their homes looked so normal on the inside.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Could it be a coincidence that they all just happened to be out?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: A whole day has passed since we got the news of their deaths.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Who goes there?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You scared the life out of me!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I just felt like someone was watching us.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You could sense that even in this crowd?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Let's continue this inside the inn.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia, stay your steps.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You know this man...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Just give me a moment, I'll have a few words with him.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I didn't expect the Monitor Censor of the Department of Discipline and Supervision to remember me. I think it's been five years since we last met?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The timing of our meeting was a memorable one.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: But not very pleasant.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Just official business, you and I both.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Are you also here to investigate the events that have transpired in Yumen, Envoy Lin?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Can the Monitor Censor offer any leads?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: No. At this time, I am not intervening in an official capacity.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I am merely acting as a former subordinate of the Lord Exorcist and as a subject of Yan, to apprehend the villains who disturb the people's peace.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I must say, I'm a little surprised that you aren't advising me to stay out of it, Monitor Censor Taihe.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I have no reason to dissuade you from your duties, Envoy Lin.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Do forgive me for prying, Envoy Lin. You have only just arrived in the city, so how exactly do you plan to investigate a case when you are yet unfamiliar with the situation?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I have my own means, of course. Don't you worry, Monitor Censor Taihe.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I have no doubt your means will prove more than adequate, Envoy Lin.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You might as well make your words clearer, Monitor Censor Taihe.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: As I said, we are on official business, and nothing more than that.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I merely offer a reminder, Envoy Lin: the enemy lies in the open while we are hidden. But do be careful still.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I will take my leave.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I've seen that big guy before, in Shangshu... I think he was from the Department of Discipline and Supervision?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Just how many mandarins do you know?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: It's not like we're friends. We just have prior dealings.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What's the difference?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The difference is that you don't want to be friends with some people you have dealings with.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Dusk.
The sun goes down quickly in early spring, and the weather is still a little cold.
The old man fills the furnace with a handful of firewood.
The weak fire is not fit for forging or even for heating. These days, all the forge equipment runs on Originium, but the old man stubbornly keeps such a useless furnace here.

While waiting for the fire to intensify, he picks up a broom and carefully sweeps up the sand that has accumulated in the courtyard overnight, leaving none of the crevices between the stone bricks untouched.
Of course, the old man knows that it will only stay clean for a moment and will soon return to its sandy state.
But he still toils to sweep the ground over and over again, as if hoping to catch a glimpse of a completely clean forge.
These legs of mine are still ache from the cold, even the weather is getting warmer.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: It's about closing time. If it isn't urgent, why not come back tomorrow?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Are you looking for someplace else, girl? This is a forge, not a clinic.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I'm looking for... a place, mentioned in a story...
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: You're hurt too bad to be running around the city like this.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I hate to say it, but the city is under high alert right now. And a girl with a knife wound has shown up on my doorstep.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: It'll be trouble for me if I don't take her in to the authorities.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The last thing I want is more trouble, so I'd better get her to explain where she came from.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You.. are you the one called Meng Tieyi?
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: It means something that you know the name, young as you are.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But I don't recognize you at all.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Shifu told me there is a forge hidden here in the nomadic city. And that the owner of the forge is a skilled swordsmith.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: He can make all kinds of weapons and armor, and also craft toys for the children of the city.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: I can't recall anyone who would talk about this old man like that.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: In the yard of the forge lies a pagoda tree, transplanted by the both of you from a faraway place.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: The old man can't help but look back.
In the corner of the yard stands a pagoda tree, leaves swaying slightly against the evening wind. Spring comes late in the north, and new leaves have yet to grow on the branches.
Now can we say that the battle is truly over.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: We've suffered a number of casualties... but for the next twenty years at least, these bandits will be cowed.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I've heard tales from long ago, of expeditions celebrating their triumphs by carving out their achievements on the furthest mountains they could see. Perhaps today we are worthy of that legacy.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Hahaha. Not a bad idea, but we have only sand around us, and nothing solid on which to write.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: There is a lone tree here, so why not...?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Good! Let's go with that!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Good?! This withered tree is about to crumble into dust, and you still want to torment it?
attributes.name: Swordswoman

attributes.content: Do you have an alternative then?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: What's the point of engraving your exploits on a fixed point when we live in a nomadic city that regularly travels thousands of li?
attributes.name: Swordswoman

attributes.content: Why not we take this tree back and replant it in Yumen?
attributes.name: Swordswoman

attributes.content: Our story will be remembered by the tree, if it manages to take root in the city, even for just a day.
attributes.name: Swordswoman

attributes.content: *claps once*
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Very well. Not a bad idea at all.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: Did you get heatstroke from being out here too long? We're at least a hundred li from Yumen. Are you planning to carry the tree all the way back there?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Why not? We carried so much food and water on the way here and now it's all gone, so what's wrong with bringing an extra tree on our way back?
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: General Zuo, Tieyi, please lend me a hand. Careful not to damage the roots.
attributes.name: Shuo

attributes.content: You called her Shifu...?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Shifu saved mine and my family's lives out in the wilderness, and taught us how live among the settled.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: What is your name?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Jieyun.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: If I'm not mistaken, you're an Anasa... yet you have such a refined name?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Shifu gave it to me.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: No wonder.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Yun dong qian li yu, jie zai ci shan qing. A classic poem. The cloud floats for a thousand li until it finally settles upon a mountaintop. She wished for you to find a home, like the cloud.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Shifu recited it better than you, but the meaning is the same.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Ahah, I have no doubt.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Come to think of it, she gave the Grandmaster his name as well.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: That fickle-minded heartless man!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: What's this then...?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Hold on, that sword you're carrying...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You stole the Grandmaster's sword?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I will bring it to Shifu's grave, as an offering.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The wind whips up the leaves, rustling the old pagoda tree.
The fire in the furnace has died down, and the sky grown dark. But the old man does not move.
The girl can't see his expression clearly.
She—she's dead?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Yes. Shifu's illness was very serious.
attributes.name: Jieyun
Jieyun
attributes.content: Her last wish was to look upon this sword one last time, so I must deliver it to her.

attributes.name: Jieyun
attributes.content: Do you want it too?
Certainly not.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Yumen is a very dangerous place to be right now.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I know that with this sword on me, all the soldiers will be hunting for me.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: No, what I'm saying is... the city will become even more dangerous in the near future.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: It's about to face a test. But before that, I should at the very least try to get you out.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Your shifu is waiting for you... as are all of us.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But how do you get out of the city?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I didn't think about it when I came in. They sealed the gates, so I tried to force my way through... and was injured in the process.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: The wind picks up.
A handful of fine sand flies onto the old man's face, and into the gap of time that has gone by.
It is soft, moist from the twilight hours of early spring
The old man kneads the sand in his fingers.
I have an idea.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Hey, welcome back.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What's the word?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No doctor or staff in the clinic, just some princely-looking official who asked me what I was doing.
attributes.name: Errand Runner

attributes.content: And what did you tell him...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just what you told me, 'Last night, I hurried over with a family member in tow, who suffered a concussion when our store shelves collapsed. We forgot to bring money for the bill, so I came back today to make the payment.'
attributes.name: Errand Runner

attributes.content: The nobleman left after asking me the question. I don't get it.
attributes.name: Errand Runner

attributes.content: Here's your money back, since I never had to pay anyone.
attributes.name: Errand Runner

attributes.content: Just keep it, take it as reimbursement for your hard work.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's so strange... is Yumen's tourist season that lucrative?
attributes.name: Errand Runner

attributes.content: I've heard of Mr. Lee's skill, but to even pull one over on the young like that?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: That just any kid. He's a Sui Regulator Candleholder, I wouldn't dare lie to him...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just helping him rule out a wrong answer.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: As for Mr. Lin, what are you doing here...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just out for a stroll.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: If we were in Lungmen Park right now, I'd believe it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: And how are things coming along for you, Mr. Lee?
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: It's a little strange. I haven't been able to figure out exactly what the job is you've asked me to do, but the one I've been looking for might be able to clue me in.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's good to hear.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: You've tasked me with the job, but you still look uneasy. Why not take matters into your own hands?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Any action I take would affect Wei Yenwu's reputation.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I also want to just watch from the sidelines and see how she does things.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Now that's the Mr. Lin I know. This is an important moment, but there's still ample time to make a probing move.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A beard well lathered is already half shaved. I have trust in you as well, Mr. Lee.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu has often lamented your decision to not stay with the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Let's not talk about that...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu... doesn't let go of somebody, if he's decided they're useful to him.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Speaking of which, are you still determined to have your girl Yühsia take over your work?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's not for me to decide.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: If she wants to stay, Lungmen will have a place for her. If she wants to leave, Lungmen won't trouble her.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: I would like you to take care of her, no matter what path she takes, Mr. Lee.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: It's an honor to have your trust, Mr. Lin.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If there's anything I can do to help out, I will give it my all.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do ze.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Now then, time to stop bothering you and continue my stroll.
attributes.name: Lin

attributes.content: Oh, Huai Tianpei... he's a father too...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Did you see the city-wide notice issued by the Patrol Battalion on your way here?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: According to the Imperial Astronomical Bureau's latest calculations, Yumen needs to adjust course to avoid a Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Starting tomorrow, at the Hour of Shen, the city will begin to slow down. By around the Hour of Yu, it will have dropped to its lowest speed, and will pick up again once the course has corrected.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Your chance lies within that timeframe.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But if the city slows down, won't the gates be even more closely guarded?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Dear girl, did you take a good look around you before entering Yumen?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: A desert spanning thousands of li, with only misfortune and the occasional traveler to meet, but a part of Yanese territory still. From the very beginning, Yumen was designed as a military fortress to guard the north.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Which is why the city has 'sand sluices' in dams on the outer wall, unlike conventional nomadic cities.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.text: It is said that a Tumu Tianshi took inspiration from the 'water wheels' in the Jiangnan waterways and fitted it onto this border city.
The base of the city sinks into the sand, but the huge dams powered by Arts are always running to disperse the sand and remove all forms of resistance.
Thanks to these 'sand sluices,' the city of Yumen is able to move flexibly across the vast desert and adapt to any situation.
Like a river current, it moves with the tide, a spectacular sight to behold.

attributes.content: Normally, the sand sluice would never serve as a path for people to walk on.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: If one jumps into the sand sluice, he can only expect to be crushed by the turbines, or suffocate under the rolling yellow sand.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: So tomorrow, at the Hour of Yu, when Yumen is travelling at its lowest speed, the flow of sand through the sluices will also be slowed... but at least there's a ghost of a chance in this idea.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I'll do it! I need to get out of the city, by any means.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: But what about your wounds?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I'll manage.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I went to a clinic earlier.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: It's just that, security around the sand sluices is usually lax, but I'm not sure if things have changed now with the city under high alert.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: On my way here, I heard the general of this city is personally leading the defense of the keep.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: It seems...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: To meet or not to meet, that was the question. But it seems the answer is meet.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You're going out?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: We have to be quick, I need to go scout the surroundings. There are also some preparations to be made, if you're to leave the city via the sand sluices.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I'll hang a 'Closed' sign on the door while I'm out, so make use of this time to recuperate.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I'll come back to fetch you.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Daai Siu Ze.
Yühsia?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Head up to my room first, I'll be there in a minute.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Any news?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Not long after you left, some people in smiths' clothes showed up, moved their goods and headed someplace else.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: I tried to follow them, but they seem to be in our line of work. They realized someone was tailing them and quickly shook me off their trail.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: I returned to the warehouse to take another look, and it had been cleared out completely. I don't know what these people are hiding, but it's clear that something strange is going on.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Your intuition was spot on, there's something off about that Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: I'm afraid we've already set the enemy on alert, and we've yet to find our key evidence.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The dark clouds over the city get thicker every day, while the sand in the wind is also denser.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The situation is urgent. Since we have our suspects, we can try some things out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Daai Siu Ze?
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Go to the barracks and fetch something for me.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia
